description: the provision, delivery and offloading of miscellaneous groceries for the Edmonton Garrison
full_summary:
GOVERNMENT OF CANADA
Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Tender Number: W0127-22P028/A

Registration and Training Recordkeeping
Source Name: Public Works and Government Services Canada
Notice Type: Request for Proposal
 Tender Closing Date: 9 August 2024 15:00
Notice Reference Number: PW-_WPG-120-11382

**Commodity Code Classification**
G.S.I.N.: N8920ZC
Standard: Groceries, Miscellaneous

**Tender Overview**
Public Works and Government Services Canada invites suppliers to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) at the Edmonton Garrison in Alberta, Canada. The contract will be a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) providing for the supply, delivery, and offloading of Miscellaneous Groceries to the Edmonton Garrison on an as-and-when-required basis.

The supplier may submit a proposal for up to five commodities, each for four (4) six-month periods. A Refresh and Rebid Period structure is outlined in Annex A and Annex B of the solicitation documents.

**Commodity Categories**
a) Protein
b) Fresh Fruit and Vegetables
c) Dairy and Eggs
d) Miscellaneous Groceries
e) Baked Goods

The procurement is competitive, and all interested suppliers may submit a proposal. Offers will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price criteria.

**Closing Time**
Closing times will remain at 2:00 PM CDT or CST, as applicable, for the initial solicitation closing and all Rebid Closings.

**Submission Requirements**
The Government of Canada prefers electronic bids using the Canada Post Corporation’s Connect service. Suppliers must convert and complete all the required information prior to submitting their offer.

**Transition to Regional Master Standing Offer**
If a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) is published for any of the commodities prior to the expiry date of the Standing Offer, this Standing Offer will be set aside and transitioned to the RMSO for all affected sites.

**Contact Information**

* Jill Aquino, Contracting Authority
* Telephone: (431) 373-1718
* Email: [jill.aquino@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:jill.aquino@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* Address: Victory Building/Édifice Victory, Room 310, 269 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3C 1B3
